00055 class VTK_ESQUI_SCENARIO_EXPORT vtkToolLaparoscopy: public vtkTool {
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00060     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkToolLaparoscopy,vtkTool);
00061 
00063     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkToolLaparoscopy";}
00064 
00066     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00067 
00069     enum vtkToolLaparoscopyModel{
00070         Probe = 0,
00071         Grasper = 1,
00072         Scissors = 2,
00073         Hook = 3,
00074         Dummy = 4
00075     };
00076 
00078     vtkSetMacro(ToolModel, vtkToolLaparoscopy::vtkToolLaparoscopyModel);
00080     vtkGetMacro(ToolModel, vtkToolLaparoscopy::vtkToolLaparoscopyModel);
00081 
00083 
00086     virtual void Init();
00087 
00089 
00092     void SetForceFeedback(float Force[]);
00093 
00095 
00100     void SetForceFeedback(float x, float y, float z) {
00101         this->ForceFeedback[0] = x;
00102         this->ForceFeedback[1] = y;
00103         this->ForceFeedback[2] = z;
00104     }
00105 
00107 
00111     void GetForceFeedback( float Force[] ) const
00112     {
00113         Force[0] = this->ForceFeedback[0];
00114         Force[1] = this->ForceFeedback[1];
00115         Force[2] = this->ForceFeedback[2];
00116     }
00117 
00119 
00123     float GetXFeedbackForce() {return this->ForceFeedback[0];}
00125 
00129     float GetYFeedbackForce() {return this->ForceFeedback[1];}
00131 
00135     float GetZFeedbackForce() {return this->ForceFeedback[2];}
00136 
00138     double * GetContactForceValue();
00139 
00141 
00144     virtual void Pull();
00145 
00147 
00150     virtual void Push();
00151 
00153     virtual void SetDepth(double depth);
00154 
00156     virtual double GetDepth();
00157 
00159     void RotateX(double angle);
00160 
00162     void RotateY(double angle);
00163 
00165     void RotateZ(double angle);
00166 
00168     virtual void Yaw(double angle);
00169 
00171     virtual void Pitch(double angle);
00172 
00174     virtual void Roll(double angle);
00175 
00176 protected:
00177 
00178     vtkToolLaparoscopy();
00179     ~vtkToolLaparoscopy();
00180 
00182     vtkToolLaparoscopyModel ToolModel;
00183 
00185     double ForceFeedback[3];
00187     double Depth;
00189     double YawAngle;
00191     double PitchAngle;
00193     double RollAngle;
